response.job_title: Sales Executive | Plastic Industry | ETP's | B2B sales | New Markets & Business Development LATAM
response.summary: Chemical Engineer in charge of the market in LATAM Specialized in technical sales of raw materials. Pincipal experience in Plastics (commodities and ETP's), Rubber, Asphalt, Adhesives, and other specialties industry. I'm interested in developing good and long term relationships with our clients and supplyers and providing high quality technical support when needed.
response.skills: Leadership, Proactive , Easily Adaptable, Microsoft Office, English as a Second Language (ESL)

profile_positions.description:
Chemical Engineer in charge of the market in Central America and Colombia specialized in technical sales of raw materials, with experience in the Asphalt, Adhesives, Rubber and Plastics industry. Interested in developing long term relationships and provide technical support.
- Give commercial technical support to different clients.
-Negotiation of raw materials with suppliers according to a market analysis.
-Planning of chemical consumption of the different assigned clients.
-Generate strategies for each of the assigned accounts in order to guarantee the purchase of products.
-Analysis of market indicators for projection of sale and purchase.
-Analysis of margin, costs and inventories in order to optimize profits.
-Develope new markets.
profile_positions.title: Technical Sales Representative

company.name: Global Plastics, LLC
company.description:
Founded in 2008, Global Plastics, LLC is a leading plastics distribution company and part of the MGI International, LLC family of companies.  With sales in over 70 countries, Global Plastics delivers solutions every day in both commodity (PE, PP, PS, PET) and engineered (ABS, PC, POM, Nylon, etc.) materials.  In addition to the traditional polymer offerings, Global Plastics is also the leader in sustainable solutions including plant-based biopolymers, recycled plastics, and specialty “green” additives.  

Combining decades of experience, a world-class line card, and a best-in-class customer service has been a formula for success for Global Plastics and our customers!

Learn more: http://www.globalplastics.net
